plot: Regis Stanely travels back in time to 1976, in an attempt to prevent the death of his hero, The King. He is supported in his quest by the ghost of Bela Lugosi.
title: Plan 17: The Purple King
plot_es: Regis Stanely travels back in time to 1976, in an attempt to prevent the death of his hero, The King. He is supported in his quest by the ghost of Bela Lugosi.
plot_en: Regis Stanely travels back in time to 1976, in an attempt to prevent the death of his hero, The King. He is supported in his quest by the ghost of Bela Lugosi.
